Description: A digital platform designed as a virtual stage for our craft, passion, and achievements. Think of it as a dedicated hub to celebrate the incredible work of Coffee Masters. So, what exactly is Cold Shot? Conceptually, it's built on a few key pillars: A Living Archive of Our Craft: It’s a dynamic newsletter and showcase where we can document and share success stories, creative projects, and beautiful customer experiences, ensuring our best work inspires others long into the future. A Hub for Professional Growth: It serves as a centralized library for coffee education, providing practical tools like certification scorecards, training materials, and a growing collection of champion recipes to support our collective development. A Tool for Tracking Our Journey: The platform includes a comprehensive directory that tracks our certification progress across all stores and districts, celebrating every new Coffee Master and providing a clear view of our community's expertise. A Platform to Build Community: Above all, it’s a space designed to connect us. It highlights our shared values, recognizes individual achievements, and tells the stories that make our coffee community so special.
